data.title: Richard Mangum on LinkedIn: MWF Melbourne
data.meta_description:
Gearing up for an exciting journey at @The Martech Weekly's upcoming Martech World Forum Melbourne from June 5th - 7th!!

Looking forward to connecting with‚Ä¶
data.text:
Are you prepared to discuss digital assets with your clients? STEP produced a report on digital assets to help practioners understand this complex topic. Thanks to the sponsors of the report, IQ-EQ. Read the report: https://lnkd.in/dNVhAKP8 #DigitalAssets

Compliance starts tomorrow. ‚è∞ Closing our #VoicesForTheDMA line-up is Carlos Zorrinho, MEP (European Parliament) and DMA rapporteur for opinion. This is what he believes we can expect from the Digital Markets Act... 1Ô∏è‚É£ People-centeredness 2Ô∏è‚É£ Fair access 3Ô∏è‚É£ Freedom of choice 4Ô∏è‚É£ Interoperability 5Ô∏è‚É£ Transparence We are ready for the new era of the digital sector, are you? Together, let's demand effective compliance with the #DigitalMarketsAct.

Have you ever imagined managing all your company's SIM cards from a single platform? Our latest article on ITWeb.co.za delves into how SIMcontrol facilitates this with real-time monitoring, provisioning, and comprehensive SIM management. Why SIMcontrol? üîç - Self-help Platform: Manage data limits, connection statuses, and SIM settings online. - Pooled Data: Data is shared across all SIMs from multiple mobile networks. - Account Flexibility: There are no long-term contract commitments or credit vetting. SIMs can be added or suspended as needed. - Fully Managed Private APN: Quickly integrate with an APN as a service on major mobile networks. Read the full article on ITWeb ‚û§‚û§ https://lnkd.in/eY8cYtpu

Governments can use crowd sourcing to search for a wide range of viewpoints and creative solutions to complex problems by exploiting the collective intelligence of citizens, along with simplifying citizens' access to government issues, information, policies and updates; digital media grants government the ability to interact with information faster.

Landlords, staying attuned to the evolving world of social media is now more important than ever. üì±üíª In his latest blog for Chartered Institute of Housing Unlocked, Bobbie Hough discusses the impact of digital communication on trust and reputation in the housing sector. üîó Read the full blog here (membership required): https://lnkd.in/eKiH4Yts

Did you know #digitalsignage has a recall rate of 83%? Ensure important information gets seen and remembered by sharing it on digital screens throughout your facilities. Learn more: https://lnkd.in/gEDSB9cm #recallrate

Solving more mysteries! What exactly do we do at Naturally Network??? We partner with rockstars like Vividly! Check out our new productions of Partner Moments-short recordings with the people and companies that power the natural products CPG industry. #natruallynetwork #naturalproducts #govividly #vividly #naturallynetwork
